question: What is the most abundant metal of the earth's crust?

nodes.text: Calcium is the most abundant metal of the earth's crust.
Copper is the most abundant metal of the earth's crust.
Magnetite is the most abundant metal of the earth's crust.
Aluminum is the most abundant metal of the earth's crust.
